headline: Senate candidate McCormick makes campaign stops in the Midstate
author: Lauren Rude
sentences: MIDSTATE, Pa. (WHTM) — Dave McCormick, Senate candidate for Pennsylvania’s open seat, made several campaign stops in the Midstate Friday, kicking it off at the U.S. Army Heritage and Education Center in Carlisle.
After touring the center in Carlisle, McCormick made his way to Dillsburg where he did a “Main Street Tour,” according to his communications director.
McCormick’s trip to Central Pennsylvania comes after his first public campaign appearance at a rally in a skeet shooting facility near Allentown.
Wrapping up his trip to the Midstate, he will host a meet and greet with campaign supporters and Pennsylvania voters Friday evening in York.
Get daily news, weather, breaking news, and alerts straight to your inbox!
Senator Ted Cruz of Texas, who endorsed McCormick, headlined the rally.
